Another scrub lord, read all of it you twat. AD buffed entirely and AP nerfed into the ground.

**Stop all the clocks, cut off the telephone,
Prevent the dog from barking with a juicy bone,
Silence the pianos and with muffled drum
Bring out the coffin, let the mourners come.
Let aeroplanes circle moaning overhead
Scribbling on the sky the message “League is Dead”.
Put crepe bows round the white necks of the public doves,
Let the traffic policemen wear black cotton gloves.
League was my North, my South, my East and West,
My working week and my Sunday rest,
My noon, my midnight, my talk, my song;
I thought that love would last forever: I was wrong.
The stars are not wanted now; put out every one,
Pack up the moon and dismantle the sun,
Pour away the ocean and sweep up the wood;
For nothing now can ever come to any good.**
Good job riot making the most unbalanced patch ever since I played. Cheaper ad item and 300+ more expensive ap item. Just wow. League crews your brains got hit by vayne?

In a 1v1 fight between an AD champion and an AP champion with equal gold, the AP champion will win 90% of the time from burst damage, while the AD champions use sustained damage. So unless you have more damage and enough lifesteal to render the burst irrelevant AD champions were getting ripped off already. It's about time they evened the playing field.
Tell that to {{champion:91}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:254}}

> [{quoted}](name=Fogged,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=FevYqYqv,comment-id=003300000000,timestamp=2015-11-16T13:45:27.979+0000)
>
> Tell that to {{champion:91}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:254}}

Hence why I said 90% of the time, assassins are a little bit different. And Yi uses sustained damage, he just attacks fast enough to, as I also said, render the burst irrelevant.

Having an AFK or troll on your team will just make the game so much more harder to come back in, due the the new minion pushing mechanic, as having a lv 1 reducing your teams average level will grant your opponents pushing advantage. Having AFKs or players that are drastically underleveled (like 7 levels lower than everyone else on your team) not count to the team average would fix this problem, and should be considered. This way, even if you do have an AFK or someone sitting in fountain, if you are skilled enough you can still win 4v5.

How are people saying {{champion:96}} is OP now he got nerfed to shit with every fucking thing he has even his stats.....
DOUBLE AS CAP WOOO!!!.... oh only when w is active? oh reduces dmg 55%..... Well then.... its a nerf by 5% dmg really....RIGHT?!

Think about this, normal cap is 2.5 attacks per second. Not counting resistances, an AD carry with max attack speed and 300 AD was doing 300 damage, 5 times every 2 seconds. Kog'Maw with 300 AD, 5 attacks per second at 55% damage is doing 165 damage per hit. That gives 1650 damage over 2 seconds as opposed to 1500 from any other ADC. When his w runs out, he goes back to 1500 damage over 2 seconds, so where exactly is the nerf there? not to mention his ult now does extra damage based on their missing health...

So, you're complaining because you can no longer passively waveclear by buying a single item? That just means you will need to open your eyes and look at which minions are low. Not to mention it is now 650g cheaper and still has the active as well

Okay so I have two concerns. One being that if say a game goes on a for a long time and there are no available item slots for pink wards. How are we suppose to prevent rengar, twitch, khazix or even shaco roaming around? The new sweeping trinket just gives you a warning that someone is nearby but doesnt give sight which doesnt seem very helpful. My second concern are the masteries, instead of nerfing the champs that were not really OP in S5, the masteries needs a bit of tweaking I reckon. Currently it feels a bit unflexible for some champs or has too much sync with others. E.g Yasuo
Well the game is shit now.
